climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Twin Pack with 25 count of ultra-soft, pre-moistened Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes with a micellar-infused triple emollient formula remove waterproof makeup and cleanses skin while leaving it feeling refreshed, soft, smooth and conditioned

Makeup remover face cleansing towelettes work to dissolve all traces of dirt, remove bacteria, impurities, oil and makeup on skin while also removing pollution, sweat and sunscreen, for superior cleansing and makeup removing power at your fingertips

Facial cleansing wet wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested and gentle around the eye area. The effective formula removes up to 99% of makeup--even stubborn waterproof mascara--without tugging
Makeup remover wipes are disposable and thoroughly cleanse skin, leaving behind no heavy residue so there's no need to rinse
Facial cleansing wipes are great to use in a daily beauty or skincare routine for a refreshing self-care experience at-home
body.description: Remove makeup in one easy step with Neutrogena Makeup Remover Face Wipes. These soft and gentle pre-moistened facial cleansing towelettes effectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil and makeup--even waterproof mascara-- for clean, fresh looking skin every day. Our makeup remover features an effective micellar-infused, triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, conditioned and thoroughly clean with no heavy residue. These facial towelettes also remove sweat, sunscreen, and pollution from skin with no need to rinse after use. These daily face wipes are formulated to be gentle on the sensitive eye area. The makeup removing wet wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, alcohols, soaps, or dyes and are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. Designed with the earth in mind, the compostable wipes are made with 100% plant-based fibers and biodegrade in 35 days in home compost.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1 Gently wipe face and neck with towelette, removing dirt and face and eye makeup. There is no need to rinse Step 2 After removing towelette, reseal pack. If stored in vanity case, secure lid Step 3 Do not flush towelettes Step 4 Leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, conditioned and thoroughly clean with no heavy residue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Go-To Makeup Remover Towelettes, with an Extra Step for Waterproof Mascara!
reviews.reviewText: I am a Makeup Pro based in Hawaii and I can't rave enough about the Neutrogena Makeup Remover Towelettes—they have easily become my favorite go-to choice for makeup removal. While they excel at removing face makeup and eyeshadow, I do have an extra step for tackling stubborn waterproof mascara. Nonetheless, these towelettes are still my top choice!Let's start with the positives. The price and quantity of these towelettes make them a great value for money. With 25 towelettes in a pack, they last for a decent amount of time, especially considering the affordable price point. I love that they are plant-based, aligning with my commitment to eco-friendly products.The packaging is incredibly convenient and user-friendly. The resealable pack keeps the towelettes moist and ready for use whenever I need them. They are compact and fit perfectly into any makeup bag, making them ideal for travel or on-the-go touch-ups.When it comes to removing face makeup and eyeshadow, these towelettes are superb. They are incredibly soft and gentle on the skin, making the process effortless and irritation-free. I'm always left with a clean and refreshed feeling after using them.Now, let's talk about waterproof mascara. While these towelettes may struggle with stubborn waterproof mascara, I have found a solution that works for me. Instead of relying solely on the towelettes, I use an oil-based liquid remover specifically designed to tackle waterproof mascara. By incorporating this extra step, I can effectively remove even the most resistant mascara. It does require a bit more effort, but it's worth it.Despite the extra step, the Neutrogena Makeup Remover Towelettes remain my absolute favorite choice for makeup removal. Their ultra-soft texture, non-irritating formula, and fragrance-free nature make them a fantastic option, especially for individuals with sensitive skin. They are versatile and excel at removing face makeup and eyeshadow, making them a staple in my beauty routine.In conclusion, the Neutrogena Makeup Remover Towelettes are my top choice when it comes to makeup removal. While they may require an extra step for waterproof mascara, they still outshine other options in terms of their overall performance and convenience. Their value for money, gentle nature, and compact packaging make them a must-have in any makeup bag. Don't hesitate to give them a try—they won't disappoint!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Makeup Removing
reviews.reviewText: Although it bothers my eyes when I use it to remove my eye makeup, it's perfect for cleaning makeup off the rest of my face. Super soft and gentle and my skin feels amazing after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used several off brands of makeup remover but they do not work as well. These Neutrogena cleansing wipes remove makeup without too much scrubbing. I live near the beach and one great thing I have discovered is that these wipes remove sunscreen from my face. I use daily for both purposes. Great stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Removes all types of makeup & is soothing to skin
reviews.reviewText: Removes all types of makeup, no matter how thick, (Like Halloween makeup.) Very gentle and soothing moisturized towelettes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product. The store we normally buy these for was out of stock. Amazon price was more than double but we purchased them anyway because we ran out of our supply at home

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for tired mama’s!
reviews.reviewText: I work, I’m a mom and I’m tired at the end of the day so this makes removing my makeup easy breezy! Only downside is the fact that after a time the closing tape stops working which dries out the wipes. But otherwise I keep buying these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I don't typically use these daily to remove makeup. I'm a reduce, reuse, recycle girl. These are great for travel though. No bottle of remover to leak all over your toiletries. No cotton pads to have to count to make sure you bring enough of them. One-stop shopping right here. Oh, and they remove all eye and face makeup. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only brand I use
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. These are the only makeup remover face wipes that I use. They are gently on your skin but still do the job. They have a very nice soft fragrance. They come in a convenient package so they are great for travel.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good. Removes all my make ups

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like these towelettes and use them for removing eye makeup/makeup. They are very gentle on the skin and are a good size.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llegó un día antes de lo previsto
reviews.reviewText: Las toallitas son buenas pero no son exfoliantes
